BIO

Legacy has been around for over 12 years performing at various venues. The band does benefits and events around the country featuring special guests and artists from different cities. Whether working at Concerts or State Fairs, no venue is too big or too small. Please contact us for your next event!

2017 - Current

The Playing Field

Colorado Springs, Colorado

The Playing Field is a Pub & Resturant establishment where Legacy took center stage performing for a benefit to help organizations. The outcome was tremendous with great support.

2015 - 2017

New Mexico State Fair

Albuquerque, New Mexico

Legacy performs yearly for the New Mexico State Fair in Albuquerque, NM. at the African Pavilion Stage. Crowds know us and are always present to see us perform.

2012 - 2015

Taos Queen Festival

Taos, New Mexico

The promoters in Taos, New Mexico that set up the Festival for the crowning of the New Mexico Queen are always happy to see us in concert performing for the large audiences that show up.
